attributes.action: Not available in Cornwall even though its been approved for use to treat SPMS
attributes.additional_details: Please support the cause and give SPMS (Secondary Progressive Multiple Sclerosis) sufferers a reason to be able to both plan and see a future that, we, they, and i can be a part of and in turn give us a chance to be a part of that future, this has taken my vision in 1 eye and took feelings from both legs and arms as well as affecting the cognitive functions of my life and there are many 1000's worse than myself please give us hope many thanks and kind regards
attributes.background: To help make this available to all SPMS (Secondary Progressive Multiple Sclerosis) sufferers as treatment options for SPMS is limited and it though will not cure us it will stop or slow this horrible illness taking more from us , as it tales from us everyday and with each day that passes reagards

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  Treatment decisions are a matter for local NHS Trusts and Clinical Commissioning Groups, but we could accept a petition calling for the Government to fund specific treatments on the NHS across England, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
